rules_text:
Indestructible
This creature cannot attack or block unless you control at least two land creatures.
Land cards in your graveyard are also 0/0 creatures that have Eternalize {3}{G}{B}. [i]({3}{B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie God with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)[/i]
